name: explore-resorts-update
description: False shows old version of explore resorts. True shows new version of explore resorts.

name: prodType-for-club-pass-resort-determination
description: Use prodType from content fragment instead of brand to determine if a resort is Club Pass for the search results page. HCWMP-4502.

name: progress-bar-update
description: False shows old style of numbers for completed steps. True shows new checkmarks for completed steps

name: booking-points-protection
description: Ability to put the add points protection functionality and hide/show in the booking flow

name: vip-privileges
description: Hiding VIP Privileges code from the UI - PRIV-80

name: restriction-of-points-protection-feature
description: When enabled points protection is not applied to rented points and when disabled points protection applies as usual.

name: modify-points-protection
description: Hides modify points protection card when disabled

name: points-calculator
description: Allow users to access the points calculator/vaction planner.

name: vip-upgrades
description: VIP Upgrades ability to enable/disable for reservations modification

name: club-rules-programming
description: False (Disabled) shows old version of components without Contract Purchase Type. True (Enabled) shows new version of components with Contract Purchase Type.

name: modify-add-nights-points-protection
description: Ability to hide existing functionality points protection in the Add Nights flow - HCWMP-4230

name: login-recaptcha
description: When flag is enabled the captcha verification is visible and required upon login. When disabled captcha verification is not visible nor required for login.
